Provide ability to store information about [derivatives](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Derivative_(finance)).

# Installation
Installing the module:
* Automatically: in VC Manager go to Configuration -> Modules -> Derivative Contracts module -> Install
* Manually: download module zip package from https://github.com/VirtoCommerce/vc-derivative-contracts/releases. In VC Manager go to Configuration -> Modules -> Advanced -> upload module package -> Install.

# Available resources
* Module related domain models as a <a href="https://www.nuget.org/packages/VirtoCommerce.DerivativeContracts.Core" target="_blank">NuGet package</a>
* Module related service implementations as a <a href="https://www.nuget.org/packages/VirtoCommerce.DerivativeContracts.Data" target="_blank">NuGet package</a>
